dmca.title: Clear Request to Take Down VividBlurry [Blogger]
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern:

1. The following post contains the copyrighted work that I believe has been infringed upon: http://vividblurry.blogspot.com/2006/04/who-is-vividblurry.html

2. All images depicted in this post are infringements upon copyrighted work. Direct links to these images are as follows:
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5176/2841/1600/Mike&20Vallebuona%208.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5176/2841/320/Mike&20Vallebuona%204.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5176/2841/320/Mike&20Vallebuona%203.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5176/2841/320/Mike&20Vallebuona%206.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5176/2841/320/Mike&20Vallebuona%209.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5176/2841/320/Mike&20Vallebuona%202.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5176/2841/320/Mike&20Vallebuona.jpg

3. I may be contacted at [Private]@gmail.com.

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
[Private]

cc: House Judiciary Committee (Subcommittee on Courts and Intellectual Property)
cc: House Commerce Committee (Subcommittee on Telecommunication, Trade, and Consumer Protection)
